review.title: “Looking for Future”
review.pros: Pros – Innovation is in the JMI's gene, knowledge management has orchestrated well. Academic and business world well compiled, and success ratio in client-side is high which I have never seen this ratio in my previous jobs. Nonstop learning. Well-designed performance system. Overseas market practices.
review.cons: Cons – Great company, but lack of public relation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – JMI must focus on public relations.
